title: How to kill my CPU processor - Quora

response.answer_text: In about 1976, ICL (if my memory serves me well) , then a large mainframe manufacturer, rented out sledge hammers, axes and safety goggles. Your $1 bought an hour to vent your frustrations in a warehouse filled with scrap machines destined for the crusher. The money went to charity. You could choose CPUs tape drives, disk drives, printers or pretty much anything non-human. Safety concerns were less onerous on companies back then, and hey, whats a drop or two of blood anyway? It felt GOOD!
